name: py-radical-entk
description:
RADICAL Ensemble Toolkit is used for developing and executing large-
scale ensemble-based workflows.

RADICAL-Utils contains shared code and tools for various RADICAL-
Cybertools packages.

dependencies.name: py-radical-pilot
dependencies.description:
RADICAL-Pilot is a Pilot system specialized in executing applications
composed of many computational tasks on high performance computing (HPC)
platforms.

dependencies.name: py-pika
dependencies.description: Pika is a RabbitMQ (AMQP 0-9-1) client library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
